name: Dimensional Dexterity
description:
Welcome to Dimensional Dexterity, an extraordinary puzzle platformer that will challenge your perception and test your problem-solving skills across multiple dimensions. Get ready to embark on a mind-bending adventure where shifting between alternate realities is the key to overcoming obstacles and conquering each level.



Interact with the environment to solve puzzles



Do some amazing platforming while shifting dimensions.



Interact with different objects in the environment.
